summary:
Passionate about developing and realizing software solutions for high-accuracy real-time systems, solving problems in a multi-disciplinary team-effort. 
Like to take responsibility in ensuring clarity and understanding within the team, providing guidance in software engineering tasks and decision making. 
Supported by my experience in the design, research and development of different scale applications, with strong mathematical and statistical background, I accomplished substantial research in biometrics, with focus on unconstrained scenarios and uncooperative applications, and acceptance in the scientific community.  
See myself as a good communication, team-player, with strong interpersonal skills. 
Also a Certified SAFe practitioner.

organizations.name: IEEE - Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

projects.title: Quis-Campi - Biometric Recognition in Surveillance Environments
projects.description:
A fully automated biometric recognition system, able to work in completely covert conditions.
My responsibilities included: devising and assembling a working prototype for biometric recognition in completely covert conditions; configuring and managing different UNIX systems for test and live environments; providing troubleshooting guidance to other researchers in the resolution of environment issues; developing a novel technique for automated facial landmark description; producing documentation for the developed techniques.
The main technologies and methodologies used were MATLAB, C++, OpenCV, Multithreading, MySQL and Unix Script.

contributors.headline: Full Professor at University of Beira Interior
Assistant Professor at University of Beira Interior

projects.title: NECOVID - Covert Negative Biometric Recognition
projects.description:
An automated system for covert and reliable biometric recognition, using the iris as a single trait.
My responsibilities included: building the theoretical support for the project, covering object recognition, negative recognition, and unconstrained iris biometrics; designing and building proof of concept for a recognition system based on periocular biometrics; developing and implementing a novel technique for eye-corner detection in facial images; producing documentation for the developed techniques.
The main technologies and methodologies used were: MATLAB, C++ and OpenCV.

contributors.headline: Full Professor at University of Beira Interior
Professor and Researcher at Universidade da Beira Interior

projects.title: Notes4Coach
projects.description:
An app for football coaches, providing a complete solution for football, including practices, exercises, games, players, statistics and all the fans.
My role was to engineer the statistics module for the application.
Technologies used: Objective-C, Cocoa and SQLite.

projects.title: BIOREC - Non-Cooperative Multimodal Biometric Recognition
projects.description:
A system for recognizing people at a distance without their cooperation, using iris and face detection and recognition techniques.
My main responsibilities included: developing and implementing a novel technique for iris recognition in the visible wavelength; producing documentation for the developed techniques; integrating the developed method with the working prototype, in close coordination with other team members. 
The technologies used were: MATLAB, C++, OpenCV and Python.

profile_positions.description:
Interface with different stakeholders and the team, analyzing bottle necks and proposing solutions.
Teach, motivate and steer the technical team to improve performance and ensure continuity. 
Work autonomously and proactively in preparing upcoming projects, anticipating opportunities and risks.
profile_positions.title: Lead Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Devise and drive high-level requirements, for both architecture, function and testing. 
Ensure performance, diagnostic and testability of highly complex systems. 
Enable functional requirements in terms of engineerability.
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the specification, design, implementation, and integration and testing of the ASML products. 
Developing and realizing software solutions for high-accuracy real-time systems, solving problems in a multi-disciplinary team-effort. 
Manage technical complexities within the scope of influence and area of expertise, working autonomously.
profile_positions.title: Software Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Research, design and develop different scale applications in the field of computer vision, with strong mathematical and statistical background. 
Coordinate with multidisciplinary teams aiming at the development of a commercially viable prototype, with high-performance and real-time requirements.

C/C++, MATLAB, OpenCV
